text: The Zambia Hockey Association (ZHA) is the governing body of field hockey in Zambia. Its headquarters are in Kitwe, Zambia. It is affiliated to IHF International Hockey Federation and AHF African Hockey Federation. Ms. Hazel Kennedy is the President of ZHA and Ms. Valentine Ziba is the secretary. ==History== ==See also== *African Hockey Federation ==References== ==External links== * ZHA-FB Zambia to host hockey tourney Zambia Hockey requests for expat coach Zambia Hockey
title: Zambia Hockey Association
